column1: Lökbatan is a settlement and municipality in Baku
column2: Azerbaijan. It has a population of 33
column3: 245.  The municipality consists of the settlements of Lökbatan

column1: It is the location of a large mud volcano
column2: and a historic oilfield. One of the first moving pictures filmed in Azerbaijan was of an oil well blowout in the 1930s. The mud volcano produced spectacular flames of natural gas in October 2001.

column1: The city has one professional football team
column3: currently competing in the second-flight of Azerbaijani football
